text: Great store ,best toys in Montreal for parents, who take  care about there children.
You can find pretty much everything there: nice wooden toys, scooters, costumes, board games, diaper bags, etc. It's probably your best option in the area for selection and affordable prices.
My first stop for birthdays and holidays. Everyone is helpful and kind, they have a good mix of toys, both mass market and harder to find.

Best option in the immediate area that I've seen for affordable and high quality kids toys, games and costumes. Nice wooden toys, cool lego, a really sweet collection of cuddly puppets in friendly fabrics. Some of the staff were incredibly mellow and nice, and one guy was a little overly intense, not a bad guy just too much for the otherwise sweet and magical vibe of the store.
